name: Coding 101 (full)
description:
Welcome to game Coding 101.

Its a game created for the BlackThornProd Game jam. The only reason I am creating it as a separate project is - so I am able to update it with bug fixes and other stuff, because the game jam goes on for another 2 weeks.

In this game, you actually have to do some "coding" to get yourself moving.

If you like this game, please consider leaving a feedback, I will be grateful.

Thanks
